title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item in library outline view for the first time.
description:
Description: In the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item for the first time.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.

Observed Behavior: When trying to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: The first attempt should allow for the successful selection of the label item in the library outline view.
OB: When trying to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: The first attempt should allow for the successful selection of the label item in the library outline view.

Add a label in the library file.
Open the library outline view.
